trans-unit.source: Represents a perspective projection camera.
trans-unit.target: 表示透視投影照相機。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera> specifies a projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera> 指定的投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]視覺化介面。

trans-unit.source: This projection includes perspective foreshortening.
trans-unit.target: 此投影包含透視圖。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera> describes a frustrum whose sides converge toward a point on the horizon.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>描述的 frustrum，其邊緣聚合朝上水平的點。

trans-unit.source: Objects closer to the camera appear larger, and objects farther from the camera appear smaller.
trans-unit.target: 到相機接近物件看起來更大，而且越遠離相機變得更小。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示正視圖和透視圖相機投影之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection")
trans-unit.target: ![正視圖和遠近景深投射](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "正視圖和遠近景深投影")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Point3D that specifies the camera's position.
trans-unit.target: Point3D，指定相機的位置。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that specifies the direction of the camera's projection.
trans-unit.target: Vector3D，指定相機投影的方向。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that specifies the upward direction according to the perspective of the onlooker.
trans-unit.target: Vector3D，指定從觀看者看去的向上方向。

trans-unit.source: Width of the camera's angle of projection, specified in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 相機投影角度的寬度，以度數指定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> class using the specified position, direction, and field of view.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的位置、方向和視野，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the camera's horizontal field of view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示相機的水平視野。

trans-unit.source: The camera's horizontal field of view, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 相機的水平視野 (以度數為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>45</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>45</c>。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, "field of view" is the horizontal bounds of the camera's projection between the camera's position and the image plane.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，「 欄位的檢視 」 會相機的投影相機的位置和映像平面之間的水平界限。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera.FieldOfView" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera.FieldOfView" /> 相依性屬性。
